.OpenServer class

Source: R/openserver-class.R
dot-OpenServer.Rd

The OpenServer class contains functions that communicate with Petroleum Experts applications such as Prosper, GAP and MBAL. The function send commands, retrieve data and write data to OpenServer variables exposed by the Windows COM interface.

Create a new OpenServer instance.

Arguments

server

passing an OpenServer object if available
variable

OpenServer variable
set_value

value to set to OpenServer variable
command

an OpenServer command
Gv

GAP variable

Value

An OpenServer object.

OpenServer class

.OpenServer
OpenServerR6

Constructors

Constructor
newOpenServer()
setOpenServer()
openserver()

Public Methods

Parameters MethodsAction
DoCmd()Send command
DoGet()Retrieve value from variable
DoSet()Set value to variable
DoSlowCmd()Send slow command
DoGAPFunc()Run GAP function

R6 Usage

$DoCmd(command)

$DoGet(variable)

$DoSet(variable, set_value)

$DoSlowCmd(command)

$DoGAPFunc(Gv)

S3 Usage

DoCmd(server, command)

DoGet(server, variable)

DoSet(server, variable, set_value)

DoSlowCmd(server, command)

DoGAPFunc(server, Gv)

See also

Other server-side items: OpenServerR6, newOpenServer(), openserver(), setOpenServer()
